recommendations: Pavas Shrigyan “Vanshika is a set of exceptional aspects of dedication, hardwork, loyalty, and consideration. The prospect of consistency she owns is unmatchable. I've managed her directly, and through the whole tenure she has never managed to disappoint me in any way. She is an ideal candidate for any kind of job opportunities that would befit her profile in every way. She is very supportive of her team members and a person one could always depend upon for getting the work done. I recommend Vanshika for every aspect that an organization needs, because undoubtedly she's the individual who sets the kind of professional standards that others would look upto.”

Harsh Sharma “Vanshika is an exceptionally proactive individual who consistently demonstrates a strong work ethic and a keen willingness to take initiative. I was consistently impressed by her ability to anticipate needs and take action before being asked. She has a natural ability to identify areas for improvement and proactively seek out solutions. Vanshika is also a diligent and dedicated team member. Overall, I have been thoroughly impressed by Vanisha's proactive approach to her work and her commitment to delivering results. I do not doubt that she will continue to excel in all of her future endeavors. I highly recommend Vanisha Shukla and am confident that she will be a valuable asset to any team.”
